## useToggle variable

Hook to create a toggleable boolean state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
useToggle: <D extends DispatchWithoutAction | Dispatch<SetStateAction<boolean>>>(initialValue?: boolean | (() => boolean)) => [boolean, D]
```
